content.value: Uncomfortable silences. Why do we feel it’s necessary to yak about bullshit in order to be comfortable?
content.speaker: Mia

content.value: I don’t know. That’s a good question.
content.speaker: Vincent

content.value: That’s when you know you’ve found somebody special. When you can just shut the fuck up for a minute and comfortably enjoy the silence.
content.speaker: Mia
